mutants.code:
def calculate_gcd_of_fraction(n, x, arr):
    MOD = 10 ** 9 - 7
    sx = sum(arr)
    adds = [sx - a for a in arr]
    adds.sort()
    while adds.count(adds[0]) % x == 0:
        ct = adds.count(adds[0])
        addsok = ct // x
        adds = [adds[0] + 1] * addsok + adds[ct:]
    min_val = min(min(adds), sx)
    result = pow(x, min_val, MOD)
    return result
